tool_description: Tracks and analyzes inventory movements including receipts, shipments, transfers, and adjustments across warehouses and time periods.

tracking_period_start.description: Start date for tracking period (ISO 8601 format)

tracking_period_end.description: End date for tracking period (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid movement type: Supported types are [receipt, shipment, transfer, adjustment, return, damage].
Date range too large: Maximum tracking period is 365 days.
Invalid warehouse filter: Warehouse ID does not exist.
No movement data: No inventory movements found for specified criteria.
usage: Specify tracking_period_start and tracking_period_end to define analysis window. Use product_filters and warehouse_filter to narrow scope. Select movement_types to focus on specific transaction types.

most_active_products.description: Product IDs with highest movement activity
